question: Karakoram Highway, one of the highest paved roads in the world, is located between which two nations?
explanation: Karakoram Highway, also known as National Highway 35 (N-35) or the China-Pakistan Friendship Highway, is located between China and Pakistan. It is one of the highest paved roads in the world. This important tourist attraction passes through the Karakoram mountain ranges near Khunjerab Pass.
